meanings.definition: A footrace longer than the traditional marathon distance of 26.2 miles.
meanings.sent1: Running an ultramarathon requires great endurance and determination.
meanings.sent2: She trained hard for the ultramarathon to test her limits.
meanings.sent3: The ultramarathon seemed like a never-ending journey through the hills.
meanings.sent4: His workday felt like an ultramarathon with back-to-back meetings.
meanings.sent5: The ultramarathon course was a challenging path through rugged terrain.

meanings.definition: A long-distance running event typically exceeding 50 kilometers in length.
meanings.sent1: Participants from around the world gathered to compete in the ultramarathon.
meanings.sent2: The ultramarathon route took runners through scenic landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The ultramarathon felt like a scenic tour with a running twist.
meanings.sent4: Her journey to success was an ultramarathon of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: Completing the ultramarathon was a personal triumph for many athletes.
